articles.author: Vishal Dikshit
articles.title: Bavuma: 'Way we started with bat and ball was the turning point' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: After opting to bat first, South Africa were 24 for 4 in the 12th over, and then allowed Australia to score 74 for 2 in the first ten overs of the chase
articles.content: NewsAfter opting to bat first, South Africa were 24 for 4 in the 12th over, and then allowed Australia to score 74 for 2 in the first ten overs of the chase

articles.author: Tanishq Vaddi, Rahul Pandey, Rahul Sadhu
articles.title: South Africa vs Australia Live Score, World Cup 2023 Semi-Final: Australia to play the WC final against India after close shave against South Africa at Eden - The Indian Express
articles.description: SA vs AUS Semi-Final Highlights, World Cup 2023: The Proteas were bundled for 212, one less than what they scored in the infamous 1999 semifinal loss against Steve Waugh's Australia.
articles.content: Pat Cummins: I think it was easier out there than sitting in the dugout. Nerve-wracking couple of hours but it was good to get the result. Wasn't expecting Starc and Hazlewood to bowl so much early. … [+2252 chars]
